content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Setup at Position(1,1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at Position(1,1)
- Burner inserter at Position(1.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at Position(1.5,3.5) containing 19 iron plates

### Iron Smelting Setup at Position(3,1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at Position(3,1)
- Burner inserter at Position(3.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at Position(3.5,3.5) containing 32 iron plates

### Iron Smelting Setup at Position(5,1)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace (position not directly visible)
- Burner inserter at Position(5.5,2.5)
- Wooden chest at Position(5.5,3.5)

### Copper Smelting Setup at Position(2,7)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at Position(2,7)
- Burner inserter at Position(2.5,8.5)
- Wooden chest at Position(2.5,9.5) containing 11 copper plates
- Transport belt system connecting Position(2.5,8.5) to Position(4.5,8.5)

### Copper Smelting Setup at Position(4,7)
Consists of:
- Stone furnace at Position(4,7)
- Burner inserter at Position(4.5,8.5)
- Wooden chest at Position(4.5,9.5)
- Multiple belt groups connecting to various positions

### Copper Cable Production Setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine-1 at Position(14.5,14.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for input/output
- Wooden chest at Position(11.5,14.5) containing 266 copper cables

### Electronic Circuit Production Setup
Consists of:
- Assembling machine-1 at Position(21.5,15.5)
- Multiple burner inserters and wooden chests for material handling

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at Position(2.5,35.5)
- Boiler at Position(7.0,35.5)
- Steam engine at Position(13.5,35.5)
- Complex pipe network connecting these components
- Electricity distribution network with multiple electric poles

ERROR TIPS

### Assembly Machine Power Issues
- Ensure assembly machines are connected to a working power supply
- Make sure the power generation system (boiler and steam engine) is properly fueled and connected

### Resource Supply Chain Issues
- Ensure proper supply of raw materials to assembly machines
- Set up reliable transport systems between storage and production facilities

### Power Generation Problems
- Keep boilers fueled consistently
- Ensure proper fluid connections between offshore pump, boiler, and steam engine
- Verify all power poles are properly connected to form a complete electrical network

### Recipe and Crafting Issues
- Items like iron plates and copper plates must be produced in furnaces, they cannot be hand crafted
- Ensure all prerequisites for crafting complex items are available before attempting to craft

### Transport System Optimization
- Consider using more transport belts to automate material movement between production facilities
- Ensure inserters are properly oriented and powered for optimal material transfer
